name: Evil Potato Dungeon
description:
Welcome to the potato dungeon!

Play through a variety of levels and rampage to destroy all the onions! There are pickups to help you on your quest, such as a nicely packed lunchbox or a pair of spare sunglasses. 

Step insides the inn for a rest, travel through the custom made locations...and enjoy this rather unfinished, and still pretty buggy project. 

This was made for one of my courses, Level Editting 2, and features my own pixel art sprites and tilesets, as well as animations. Enjoy!

[[Controls]]

Arrow keys: Movement
Space bar: Shoot
I: Open/Close Inventory
L/S: Use inventory items
